chapter.title: System Requirements
chapter.para:
JBoss Developer Studio is certified to run on the following platforms:
Windows XP (i386 and x86_64) running 32-bit Sun JDK 6
Windows XP (i386 and x86_64) running 64-bit Sun JDK 6 (*)
MacOS X 10.6 running 32-bit Apple JDK 6
MacOS X 10.5 running 64-bit Apple JDK 6 (*)
RHEL5 i386 running 32-bit Sun JDK 6 and OpenJDK 6
RHEL5 x86_64 running 64-bit Sun JDK 6 and OpenJDK 6
(*) The visual component of the Visual Page Editor is not supported in these configurations.

The minimum requirements are:
1 GB RAM
450 MB of hard disk space for the non-EAP version
800 MB of hard disk space for the EAP version

The recommended requirements are:
4 GB RAM
